name: Supplier Performance & Negotiation Agent
tagline: Data-driven insights for supplier management and negotiations
overview: The Supplier Performance & Negotiation Agent provides procurement teams with comprehensive supplier performance insights and negotiation preparation support. It aggregates performance data, benchmarks against peers, and helps prepare for supplier discussions with data-backed talking points.
whatItDoes: Aggregates supplier performance across quality, delivery, and cost
Benchmarks supplier performance against category peers
Prepares negotiation briefs with relevant data points
prompts: How has Supplier X performed over the last 12 months?
Benchmark this supplier against others in the category
What should I focus on in next week's business review?
Prepare a negotiation brief for contract renewal
Which suppliers have the most improvement potential?
guardrails: Performance data verified by category managers
Negotiation strategies developed by procurement professionals
Does not communicate directly with suppliers
Pricing decisions follow standard approval processes
Market benchmarks from approved sources only
whatsNext: Validating concept with strategic sourcing team. Defining data integration requirements.
